Docs.param: the class to get the package of.
Docs.summary: Get the package for the specified class.
Docs.returns: the package of the class. It may be null if no package information is available from the archive or codebase.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Java.Lang.Package[] GetPackages() cil managed

Docs.summary: Get all the packages currently known for the caller's ClassLoader instance.
Docs.returns: a new array of packages known to the callers ClassLoader instance. An zero length array is returned if none are known.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the title of this package.
Docs.value: the title of the implementation, null is returned if it is not known.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the name of the organization, vendor or company that provided this implementation.
Docs.value: the vendor that implemented this package..

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the version of this implementation.
Docs.value: the version of the implementation, null is returned if it is not known.

Docs.param: the version string of the desired version.
Docs.summary: Compare this package's specification version with a desired version.
Docs.returns: true if this package's version number is greater than or equal to the desired version number

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this package's version string or the one provided are not in the correct format.

Docs.summary: Return the title of the specification that this package implements.
